name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PurposeTab: Your daily focus on each new tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your daily focus, habits, to-do's, goals, and more - always a click away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a test package for PurposeTab, a tab extension for tracking your focus, habits, to-do's and more! Use this to test PurposeTab and provide feedback to our team of developers.
